import styles from './header-slidingBox.module.scss' import '../../../sours/icon/style.css' import { useState } from 'react' interface SlidingBoxProps { status?: 'default' | 'mobail', role?: string, info?: string | React.ReactNode } export default function SlidingBox(props: SlidingBoxProps) { const [work, setWork] = useState(false) return
setWork(!work)}>
{props.role}
{props.info}
}
